thread.title: Salient CRGT David Vennergrund to Present at Predictive Analytics World
thread.title_full: Salient CRGT David Vennergrund to Present at Predictive Analytics World

title: Salient CRGT David Vennergrund to Present at Predictive Analytics World
text:
[October 13, 2015] Salient CRGT David Vennergrund to Present at Predictive Analytics World 
FAIRFAX, Va. , Oct. 13, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Salient CRGT, Inc., a leading provider of full lifecycle information technology and training services with expert depth in Agile software development, data analytics, mobility, cyber security, and infrastructure announces its Data Analytics Center of Excellence Director, David Vennergrund will co-present with Stephen Dennis , Innovation Director, Homeland Security Advanced Research Projects Agency (HSARPA), Science and Technology Directorate, U.S. Department of Homeland Security. 
The discussion titled "Moving Data Analytics from Proof to Production" at Predictive Analytics World for Government in Washington, DC at the Grand Hyatt Washington Hotel Wednesday, October 14 th 4:00 – 4:45 PM EDT . 
Predictive analytic solutions in government systems are not new, nor particularly novel. There are successful implementations built on methods ranging from traditional statistical regression to machine learning and data mining techniques. While practitioners develop successful proofs-of-concept, not all proofs become part of production system. What are the characteristics of successful projects and why do the others fail? 
Mr. Vennergrund will explore these questions and share best practices to help ensure your proof makes an impact in production. "As an analytics solution developer, I have seen good proofs fail to leave the lab setting," states Mr. Vennergrund. "I look forward to sharing best practices to help proofs leave the lab and make real mission impact." 
Salient CRGT will be on hand to demonstrate its distinctive Proof-to-Impact Analytics™ advanced, big data analytics service offering. They will explain how the company uses advanced analytics on premise or in the cloud to enable its clients to rapidly transform raw data into actionable proof and forward-looking insights for data-driven decisions and innovations. The company's solutions harness the power of data to predict and prepare for threats such as fraud and cyber security attack, before they happen. 
About Salient CRGT Salient CRGT provides federal civilian, defense, homeland, and intelligence agencies with expert depth in Agile software development, data analytics, mobility, cyber security and infrastructure. We support these core capabilities with full lifecycle IT services and training—to help our customers meet critical goals for pivotal missions. The most innovative talent delivery model in the industry, scientifically providing exactly the right people for the customers' most pressing requirements, fuels these critical capabilities. Salient CRGT has earned a record of success with integration and operations of largescale, highvolume solutions. On September 15, 2015 , Salient and CRGT announced closing of the merger transactions – visit newsroom . For additional information on Salient and CRGT, visit www.salientcrgt.com
